mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dm SET last_msg = NULL
mapper.select: SELECT B.seq, B.msg , B.created_at as createdAt , A.iuser as writerIuser, A.pic as writerPic FROM t_user A JOIN t_dm_msg B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE B.idm = #{idm} ORDER BY B.seq DESC LIMIT #{startIdx},#{rowCount}

SELECT A.idm, A.last_msg as lastMsg , A.last_msg_at as lastMsgAt , D.nm as otherPersonNm, D.pic as otherPersonPic FROM t_dm A JOIN t_dm_user B ON A.idm = B.idm JOIN t_dm_user C ON B.idm = C.idm JOIN t_user D ON C.iuser = D.iuser WHERE B.iuser = #{loginedIuser} AND C.iuser != #{loginedIuser} ORDER BY A.last_msg_at DESC LIMIT #{startIdx},#{rowCount}
